p: Antifungal activity of NsW2 and NsW4 against Aspergillus spp. was equal, whereas NsW2 was less active towards A. fumigatus 2K and A. oryzae 1K but not on A. flavus 3K. The activity of all peptides tested against A. flavus was comparable to reference polyene cyclic antibiotic AmB ( Figure 3). Interestingly, none of the major nigellothionins inhibited the growth of A. terreus or of the control antifungal drugs.
